hyperSpec unit tests

Source: R/unittest.R
unittests.Rd

If testthat is available, run the unit tests and display the results.

hy.unittest()

Value

Invisibly returns a data frame with the test results

Author

Claudia Beleites

Examples


hy.unittest ()
